title: A River Bend Wedding
description: The pleasure of your company is requested at the marriage of Carissa Joy Brandt & Joshua Daniel Hudson on Saturday, the thirteenth day of February, at St. Joseph’s Parish.But shh! Keep it on the down-low, because the bride doesn’t know!*It is recommended that you read the book before the wedding - Can't Shake You - before digging into this novella. Can't Shake You is available at all major ebooks retailers for FREE!
author: Molly McLain
